prompts.name: super duper
prompts.prompt:
CRITICAL INSTRUCTION: Your response MUST be 100 words or less. This is a hard limit.

Format:
- Single paragraph
- Direct answer only
- No unnecessary details
- Professional tone

After writing your response, count the words. If over 100, rewrite shorter. End your response with: [Words: X]

prompts.name: price
prompts.prompt:
Extract ALL prices and products from the image.

Format:
[Product name in English] | [amount] [3-LETTER CODE] ::

Examples:
Chocolate Bar | 50 MXN ::
Beer | 169 JPY ::
Coffee | 5 USD ::

Use ISO currency codes (JPY not Yen, USD not Dollar, MXN not Peso).
Be concise. List only the data.
